DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this regulatory Post-Marketing Surveillance in Korea is to reconfirm the clinical usefulness of Eliquis through collecting, reviewing, identifying and verifying the safety and effectiveness information about Eliquis in general practice
DOC.criteria: Signed data release Patients undergoing elective total hip replacement arthroplasty or elective total knee replacement arthroplasty Being treated for an indication not approved for the use of Eliquis® in Korea Is contraindicated for the use of Eliquis® as described in the Korean label
